commands.description: Fetches a site's allow list, which resides on the Signal Sciences' platform.

commands.description: Fetches a site's block list, which resides on the Signal Sciences' platform.

commands.description: Adds an IP address to a site's allow list, which resides on the Signal Sciences' platform.

commands.description: Removes an IP address from a site's allow list, which resides on the Signal Sciences' platform.
commands.name: sigsci-whitelist-remove-ip

commands.description: Removes an IP from a site's block list, which resides on the Signal Sciences' platform.

commands.description: Returns all site names from the Signal Sciences platform.

commands.description: Adds a custom alert to a site in Signal Sciences.

commands.description: Retrieves data for an alert.
commands.name: sigsci-get-alert

commands.description: Deletes an alert from a given site in Signal Sciences.
commands.name: sigsci-delete-alert

commands.description: Updates the attributes of a given alert.
commands.name: sigsci-update-alert

commands.description: Retrieves all alerts for given a site.
commands.name: sigsci-get-all-alerts

commands.description: Retrieves all site lists for a given site.

commands.description: Deletes a given corp list.

commands.description: Retrieves data about all lists for the given corp.
commands.name: sigsci-get-all-corp-lists
